QuestData.Title: Your Friend On The Inside
QuestData.RewardText: Didn't think we'd leave you to face the fel orc army by yourself, did you?$B$B<Yarzill's eyes flicker a translucent blue.>$B$BAye, we are here with you, $n. For every service you perform for the fel orcs in your quest to reclaim Netherwing lands, we'll be at your side to make sure that they suffer a sufficient setback.$B$BYou'll need to keep a low profile so as not to draw any unwanted attention to yourself during your sabotage missions.
